text: The Omani ambassador in Beijing is the official representative of the Government in Muscat, Oman to the Government of the People's Republic of China. ==List of representatives== {| class="wikitable sortable" !| Diplomatic agrément/Diplomatic accreditation !| Ambassador !| Observations !| List of rulers of Oman !| Premier of the People's Republic of China !| Term end |- | | |The governments in Beijing and Muscat, Oman established diplomatic relations |Qaboos bin Said al Said |Hua Guofeng | |- | |Ibrahim Hamood al-Subhi | |Qaboos bin Said al Said |Hua Guofeng | |- | |Awad Badar al-Shanfari | |Qaboos bin Said al Said |Zhao Ziyang | |- | |Farid bin Mararak al- Hanaei | |Qaboos bin Said al Said |Zhao Ziyang | |- | |Mushtaq Bin Abdullah Bin Jaffer Al-Saleh | Mushtaq Bin Abdullah Bin Jaffer Al-Saleh |Qaboos bin Said al Said |Li Peng | |- | |Abulah Bin Mohammed Bin Abdullah Al-Farisy | Abulah Bin Mohammed Bin Abdullah Al-Farisy |Qaboos bin Said al Said |Li Peng | |- | |Abdullah Hosny |Abdullah Hosny |Qaboos bin Said al Said |Zhu Rongji | |- | |Abdullah Saleh Al Saadi | |Qaboos bin Said al Said |Wen Jiabao | |} , The diplomatic service of the People's Republic of China as of November 1984, Institut für Asienkunde, 1985 - 120 p., p. 107 == References == China Oman
title: List of ambassadors of Oman to China
